# Get input
a1, a2, a3 = map(int, input().split())  # Get input

# Print result
if a1 + a2 + a3 >= 22:  # If sum of input is 22 or more
    print("bust")  # Print "bust"
else:  # If sum of input is less than 22
    print("win")  # Print "win"

# Print result
if a1 + a2 + a3 >= 22:
    print("bust")
else:
    print("win")

# Get input
a1 = int(input())
a2 = int(input())
a3 = int(input())

# Print result
if a1 + a2 + a3 >= 22:
    print("bust")
else:
    print("win")


def main():
    # Get Input
    a1, a2, a3 = map(int, input().split())

    # Check if Bust
    if a1 + a2 + a3 >= 22:
        print("bust")
    else:
        print("win")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
